County Clare is looking solid! Today, expect 4 ft @ 8s W with a light SSE wind at 12 mph. Lahinch Beach and Lahinch Left are prime spots, especially from 08:44 to 16:49. Tomorrow, the swell ramps up to 8 ft @ 14s W, with a gentle 8 mph SW wind, making for some epic conditions across the board. Day after, it holds at 7 ft @ 14s W with a light SE breeze, still offering great waves at places like Crab Island and Doolin Point. Best: tomorrow.
